column1: Little Goat Diner////They accommodated our group of seven at a large table. We started with several apps: hot crab dip (comes with ritz crackers)
column2: crispy shrimp cocktail (think shrimp lettuce wrap) and goat chili cheese fries. Oh my
column3: those fries. They smoke their fries for three hours (say what!). French fries will never be the same again.
